issue.title: [C++] Implement "value counts" kernels for tabulating value frequencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1572](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1572). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is related to "match", "isin", and "unique" since hashing is generally required
